data.name: Wicked Paradise
data.detailed_description:
Story
Take control of a young man who struggles to find a place in the world and doesn't know what lies before him. Even with an easy life and a few downfalls, he feels like it's been only a failures. Living in the city of Los Edenos he cannot afford to be down bad. Until he's approached with a life-changing offer, that can potentially bring him closer to a life he thinks he deserves... Or ruin everything. Discover people's stories around you and your inevitable consecration into a world of crime. Build relationships with them. Your choices may or may not get you what you desire.

Game Features
  • Free-roam, point and click navigation with interactable environment and dating-sim elements.
  • Uniquely created 3D instances.
  • High quality QHD renders and animations.
  • Event replay allowing you to relive every event, times and times again.

Story

Living in the city of Los Edenos he cannot afford to be down bad. Until he's approached with a life-changing offer, that can potentially bring him closer to a life he thinks he deserves... Or ruin everything. Discover people's stories around you and your inevitable consecration into a world of crime. Build relationships with them. Your choices may or may not get you what you desire.

data.short_description: Wicked Paradise is a point and click, visual novel adventure, with mysterious and naughty story. Get into a world of crime, lies and lewdness. It's up to you to get everything you've ever wanted, or ruin it all.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: 2GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics capable of OpenGL 2.0 and higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Dynamic Resolution

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15.3
  • Processor: 2GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Latest or running on 64 bit
  • Processor: 2GHz Dual-Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics capable of OpenGL 2.0 and higher
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Dynamic Resolution

content_descriptors.notes:
Wicked Paradise have a sexual content and nudity. The sexual content depicted include fetishes such as MILF, teen, voyeurism, feet, big boobs.
Game depicts drugs abuse such as smoking and use of light drugs.
Game doesn't depicts sexual assaults or non-consensual sex, self-harm NTR.
